_header: Mirthfull mother and maid Mary / That bore Christ us on rood to buy
Subjects: Virgin Mary, assumption of; legends, of Jesus and Mary
_description: ‘De Assumpcione beate marie virginis’, in one MS of the Northern Homily Cycle

HunHM129.First Lines:
Mirthful modyr and mayyd maryþat bare crist vs on rode to
                    by…
HunHM129.Last Lines:
…Þare crist hir sum is cumly kyngeÞroght hir prier
                    he þeddyr vs brynge
